actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A resolution to establish a national commission on housing for the elderly.

summary.text: Establishes the National Commission on Housing for the Elderly which shall have responsibility for investigating: (1) present Federal programs to provide low- and middle-income housing for senior citizens; (2) the need for additional housing; (3) the feasibility of rehabilitating existing central city housing; and (4) the need for activities and a living environment which provides adequate security. Requires the Commission to submit to the President and the Congress a report on the investigation together with its recommendations, not later than 18 months after the date on which a majority of the membership is appointed.

titles.title: A resolution to establish a national commission on housing for the elderly.
